definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The Battle of Kursk had ended just two weeks before.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾斯克戰役剛過去兩週。

sentences.english: German troops have started fighting near Kursk.
sentences.chinese: 德軍在庫爾斯克附近發起戰鬥。

sentences.english: The German offensive near Kursk fails.
sentences.chinese: 德軍在庫爾斯克的進攻失敗了。
